languages.text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "Very good. I will even let you choose — name your victim."

languages.text: {n}Маражай усмехается.{/n} "Славно. Я даже предоставлю тебе право выбрать — назови имя".
{n}玛拉斋露齿而笑。{/n}“很好，那我就把选择的权利交给你——说出那个人的名字。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "Very good. I will even let you choose — name your victim."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋露齿而笑。{/n}“很好，那我就把选择的权利交给你——说出那个人的名字。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sonríe burlonamente.{/n} «Muy bien. Incluso te dejaré decidir: dime el nombre de la víctima».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "Very good. I will even let you choose — name your victim."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sonríe burlonamente.{/n} «Muy bien. Incluso te dejaré decidir: dime el nombre de la víctima».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sourit de toutes ses dents.{/n} « Parfait. Je vous laisse choisir. Qui sera votre victime ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "Very good. I will even let you choose — name your victim."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sourit de toutes ses dents.{/n} « Parfait. Je vous laisse choisir. Qui sera votre victime ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai grinst.{/n} "Sehr gut. Ich überlasse Euch sogar die Wahl – nennt mir Euer Opfer."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "Very good. I will even let you choose — name your victim."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai grinst.{/n} "Sehr gut. Ich überlasse Euch sogar die Wahl – nennt mir Euer Opfer."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはニヤリと笑う。{/n}「いいぞ。選択権も与えてやろう…犠牲者の名を呼べ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "Very good. I will even let you choose — name your victim."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはニヤリと笑う。{/n}「いいぞ。選択権も与えてやろう…犠牲者の名を呼べ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sırıtıyor.{/n} "Çok güzel. Senin seçmene izin bile vereceğim. Kurbanının adını ver."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "Very good. I will even let you choose — name your victim."
